title: SQL on FHIR tests schema
description: Standard format for JSON test definitions used to validate SQL on FHIR view runner implementations.

title.description: The name of the test suite.

description.description: A description of the test suite.

allowExtendedFhirpath.description: If true, the test runner should allow the use of FHIRPath functions outside of the restricted subset defined in the specification.

authors.description: The authors of the test suite.

generated.description: If true, the test suite was generated by a tool and should not be edited directly.

resources.description: A list of FHIR resources that are used in the tests. There can be multiple different resource types in the list. Each should be a valid FHIR resource.

tests.description: A list of tests to run against the view.

view.description: The view to run the test against.

expect.description: The expected result of the test. Each object within the array represents a row in the result set, with column names as keys.

expectCount.description: The expected number of rows in the result.

expectError.description: If true, the test is expected to throw an error.

expectColumns.description: The expected columns in the result set.
